fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom
Class Server

Object
  Server

public class Server
extends Object

Receives association requests.

There is one Server instance per TCP port the application listens to.

The application can be notified of exceptions occuring during association establishment or message exchange using setExceptionListener(ExceptionListener) and the ExceptionListener interface.

Instances of Server are not created by the application but must be obtained from the server field of the relevant class.

Field Detail

DEFAULT_EXCEPTION_LISTENER

public static final ExceptionListener DEFAULT_EXCEPTION_LISTENER
The default exception listener that prints error message to the standard error.

Method Detail

getAERegistry

public AERegistry getAERegistry()
Returns the AE registry of this server. The plugin AE is automatically included in the registry, associated with the localhost address and the port the server is listening to.

setExceptionListener

public void setExceptionListener(ExceptionListener el)
Replaces the current exception listener by the specified one. By default, an exception listener printing error messages to the standard error is installed.

Parameters:
el - the new exception listener. If null exceptions will be ignored.

setRawValues

public void setRawValues(boolean b)
Deprecated. Use StorageSCP.setRawValues(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.RawValues) instead.

setRawMode

public void setRawMode(boolean b)
Deprecated. Use StorageSCP.setRawValues(fr.apteryx.imageio.dicom.RawValues) instead.

When set to true, DICOM objects received by any Storage SCP operating on this server are kept in raw mode.
